alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bexar; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Medina, northeastern Frio, northwestern Atascosa, west central Wilson and southwestern Bexar Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stinson Municipal Airport, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Devine, Poteet, Castroville, Stinson Municipal Airport, Lytle, Somerset, Elmendorf, Natalia, Lacoste, Moore, Noonan, Dunlay, Pearson, Leming, Bader, Bigfoot, Sandy Oaks, Von Ormy and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
